snippet.title: Dark Castle - Atari ST / STE
snippet.description:
In this video, Dark Castle, released in 1989 for the Atari ST by Mirrorsoft.
Situated on the top of a desolate hill lies the Dark Castle, home of the evil Black Knight. You are a wanna-be hero that must survive 14 levels and overthrow the aforemontioned Black Knight. Ported from the Mac, this game has made its way to the ST. It's a classic platform game with many dangers to avoid and a normal difficulty that becomes harder thanks to the horrible controls.
Graphically is quite a good game, polished, with neat sprites and good sound. The playability is its weak point due to bad controls, so bad that I've recorded the game in demo mode, because I couldn't make enough footage to make a video.
Here you'll find intro, and demo gameplay.

All footage taken from original hardware machines and upscaled to 1080P.

Let me know what do you think about the video in the comments below but, most important, Enjoy!!!
If you liked the video, please consider giving a thumbs up and maybe also subscribe.

Thanks for watching.
